sentences: Töövõime on suur väärtus ja värk peab olema kvaliteetne.
Mehhanism töötab täiuslikult, kuid see väike värk tuleb parandada.
context: The word 'värk' in Estonian has several related meanings. It can refer to work or labor in general, a specific job or task, handicrafts or handiwork, and can also mean a mechanical repair or fix needed on something. The connotation varies depending on context - from everyday tasks to professional work to mechanical repairs.
